description: The netgear powerline av 500 adapter kit extends your internet access to any electrical outlet for the most demanding applications. it offers easy, plug-and-play setup and provides faster speeds for the most demanding applications. perfect for connecting hdtvs, blu-ray players, dvrs, pcs and game consoles to your home network and the internet.
title: Netgear XAVB5001 Powerline Network Adapter Kit (XAVB5001)
